channel.title: Alex Baskin on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Alex Baskin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Valley’ EP on Show’s Future Without Jax Taylor, Scheana Shay’s Husband’s Infidelity and the “Gen Z” ‘Vanderpump Rules’ Reboot
item.description: Alex Baskin chats with The Hollywood Reporter about the prospects of a third season of the Bravo show and how season 12 of ‘Vanderpump’ “has hallmarks of the original but feels completely different.”

item.title: ‘The Valley’ EP on Show’s Future Without Jax Taylor, Scheana Shay’s Husband’s Infidelity and the “Gen Z” ‘Vanderpump Rules’ Reboot
